comments.body: This would be interesting l to see, imagine a 2009 texture of the ravager, or the wither. I personally think it should be called the "Nostalgic Memory" Texture Pack.
Actually thatâ€™s a great name
I definitely agree. But the texture pack should be free
It should just be called the "Cave Game" texture pack.

I agree with the Cave Game texture pack name, and the blocks could be textured in the same style as the original texture seen here

The new textures will probably use high contrast and saturation with a less realistic vibe so they fit with the original feel better.
They can Also add the classic sounds too before they got updated maybe.
I want old cow sounds, old grass sounds, and other old sounds. Anything Alpha
Can you please do it in the Marketplace next Update for Free (0 Minecoins) Please?ðŸ˜€
With old music please
Oh Can you also please add old title screen and everything which means resource and behavior packs, according to other people's comments please
I would also like to have old Minecraft sounds on this

Can you also put TU11 Tutorial World on either the Create World section for without using nintendo/microsoft account and dont require internet or just put it in the Marketplace for FREE (0 Minecoins)? Please!?
I also wanted an extra TU11 Tutorial and Title Screen.

Moved to proper category.

Thanks for your contribution.
They look pretty much the same to me...
I agreed with you because the Light Blue Color Blocks are similar to Cyan Color Block Textures. I like the old texture pack too back in 2015 and 2016.
Instead of using the oven why not use the new smoker to be able to change the color

Please bring back the old color wool blocks before the World of Color Update released in May-June 2017.

(Color Blocks Need To Be Reverted To Their Original Color Textures)

I don't like the way the color texture on the blocks from the World of Color Update released in May-June 2017; I like it when they were fine in 2015 and 2016, and there are many people who don't like it as well of the changed of the color texture on the blocks.
i prefer the new colours now, but i like the idea of cooking them in an oven to get the old textures so ima vote
Return Lime, Green, Cyan and Rose from 2009 (0.020a)
Also, change the walking animation, and change the animation for it hitting you normally

Yes! This is reported as a bug as well, but it is good to have here on the feedback site too.

https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE-29181
in fact you can change this by resource pack, Modify all "lookat_xyz" to "rotate_xyz" in all particle files.
Please add a button to disable the render dragon
and if this does get added make it both on java and bedrock please
Yes 3D Chunks would be a great performance saver as well as the use of LODs for further away chunks.

Yes LODS are fantastic no doubt though I wonder why the game does 16xinfinitex16 chunks instead of proposed cubed chunks? In theory performance would go through the roof since you're rendering like 70% or such less needless chunks!
What about the Enderman? Otherwise, great idea!
396599340211 I don't think Endermen should have red eyes because they already have their extendable jaw that can visually show us if they're angered.
we need this
Since it's "crying" obsidian, make it cry.
I even expected to have an animated texture when I got the nether update but was disappointed because it wasn't animated.
it would be cool if in that weather, there could be a rare chance of seeing rainbows!
Great idea and I hope that this will get more attention since minecraft does need to make things easier for the player to tell what they are looking at.
this is logical, but if the developers are too lazy, let them at least show the level
This makes so much sense so that we protect our horses
It would definitely be helpful, it should be above the horse's health points and have slightly different graphics than the player's defense points.
We need this. I watched a youtuber talk about this and I really want it to be added. It makes minecraft a little bit more realistic.
Very needed
Can't you do that with Texture packs?

I agree - the way this is implemented is confusing.  I can't just start a regular vanilla Minecraft game and play with the enhanced RTX options.  I have to find, download and enable a specially crafted "world" instead.  I just want to play vanilla Minecraft with raytraced graphics!
*the weather will be weathier than before*
That would be so much better!!
How about NO! thats simply disgusting and would be bad for players with Arachnophobia!!!!!!
No support from me, sorry. Your model's just too creepy and like MaxiRau12 said, players with Arachnophobia might even quit playing altogether.

Yes I love it!

Minecraft spiders are not scary which is a shame and I have always hated how spiders just stick their faces into walls and hover upwards this looks way better.

That would be so cool! Being someone who loves spiders, I literally need this, I generally don't get why some people call this disgusting and it'll make people quit, the modelling for this really takes some talent.
They should also be extra sparkly when only a tall tree can grow.
Instead of black or red, how about a deadish brown?

I like this idea, though rather than logs branching off you could actually have rod like branches itself for each tree. Theyâ€™ll be slightly thicker than end rods and can connect to logs as well as other branches. Leaves can also be put onto top of branches and will generate like this so that there are no awkward air spaces between the leaves next to the branches if that makes any sense. Branches can be simply used to make 2 sticks same as a plank. This way can make the trees look way cooler and more dynamic.
I agree with the colors, but I can do without the fonts. This is an easy change too, the color is just one or two strings of code
Also, with the 2 new signs. Crimson and warped as they are hard to read too

It's been two years and this still isn't fixed!  Even the inventory icon for the dark oak sign shows a light font color.  In the meantime I'm sticking with birch signs because they have the best contrast.
Would not fit minecrafts style and would be bad for performance
Completely agree.

I'm slightly curious.  Does this have a lack of votes because people haven't really looked at it, or is it because people don't like the idea?  And if the latter, they like birch as it is but don't feel strongly enough to post?
Sorry, But Don't really see it in my head, so could you post a Minecraft example picture of it?

Genuinely, I'm very confused on why there isn't a resolution slider on Minecraft Bedrock edition for Xbox, as Minecraft on the X|S & PS5 renders at 3840x2160 despite what your screen can output, diminishing performance when it doesn't need to be, if yiu have a 1080p monitor like I do, why would you need a game to render in full 4k? & Not to mentionâ€” the 60fps cap on these consoles, yet my mobile phone can run Minecraft at 120fps??

It would be great to have an FPS option/resolution slider.
please add 120fps ðŸ˜­
Yes your idea is ideal for the sake of this community.
Bruh, this doesn't even happen
We don't need render dragon
